entry.tran: 凝乳(牛奶变酸后形成的白色黏稠物质)
entry.def: The thick white substance which is formed when milk turns sour can be referred to as curds .

means.word_mean: 1. a coagulated liquid resembling milk curd;
2. coagulated milk; used to made cheese;

sentences.sentence: "Little Miss Muffet sat on a tuffet eating some curds and whey"
